roleset.name: shine or show quickly

example.name: all args
example.text: The student's flashing of the laser pointed at the professor's back was very disruptive to the class.

roleset.note: Based on Sharp data. Comparison to flash.01-v and flash.01-n. Flash.01-v is a member of VN classes crane-40.3.2 and light_emission.43.1. Framed by Katie
